verses.name: Luke 7:1
verses.text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people, he entered into Capernaum.

verses.name: Luke 7:2
verses.text: And a certain centurion’s servant, who was dear unto him, was sick, and ready to die.

verses.name: Luke 7:3
verses.text: And when he heard of Jesus, he sent unto him the elders of the Jews, beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant.

verses.name: Luke 7:4
verses.text: And when they came to Jesus, they besought him instantly, saying, That he was worthy for whom he should do this:

verses.name: Luke 7:5
verses.text: For he loveth our nation, and he hath built us a synagogue.
